Text: On your uTorrent right click on this torrent that your currently seeding and click properties then select the checkbox that says initial seed it will make it much to seed the torrent to mulitple users.
Gotcha. I'm new at this so bear with me.
Yes and another plus to initial seeding is that it doesn't show you on the peers column as the 100% so you somewhat invisible to other leechers.
